DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate that intralesional injection of bevacizumab on primary pterygium can reduce the corneal pterygium area, inflammation, redness and other symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Intralesional Bevacizumab Injection on Primary Pterygium
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of intralesional injection of bevacizumab on primary pterygium treatment
